function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Workers experiencing stress and anxiety due to changes in work environment and social distancing","Impact":"Decreased well-being, productivity, and mental health of employees","Mitigation":"Providing resources for stress management, mental health support, and training on managing remote work","Technologies":"Online resources, virtual meetings, mental health apps, communication tools","People":"Office workers, field workers","Owner":"Employers"},{"Description":"Lack of proper physical distancing and safety measures at work sites","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among field workers","Mitigation":"Staggered break times, restricted number of people in work areas, adjusted work sites for physical distancing","Technologies":"Scheduling software, communication tools, monitoring systems","People":"Field workers","Owner":"Employers"}]}
